# <a name="how-to-attach-files-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="635d4-102">Prilaganje datotek v Outlooku v spletu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="635d4-102">How to attach files in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="635d4-103">Na dnu sporočila ali dogodka koledarja izberite ikono sponke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="635d4-103">At the bottom of a message or calendar event, select the paperclip icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="635d4-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="635d4-104">.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="635d4-105">Izberite **Prebrskaj ta računalnik** , da priložite datoteko v računalniku, ali pa si **oglejte mesta v oblaku** , da priložite spletno datoteko.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="635d4-105">Select **Browse this computer** to attach a file on your computer or **Browse cloud locations** to attach an online file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="635d4-106">Če želite izvedeti več, glejte [prilaganje datotek v Outlooku v spletu](https://support.office.com/article/48b8dca1-7a76-43ce-97d1-e1cf73893f55).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="635d4-106">To learn more, see [Attach files in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/48b8dca1-7a76-43ce-97d1-e1cf73893f55).</span></span>
